channel.title: Changing attack styles for custom weapons & Changing punch/kick/block (unarmed)
channel.description:
I'm currently using a 317 base and have been trying to figure out how to change the attack styles for the custom whips I've added for the past hour :confused:
Im not sure if it's client sided, server sided, or both... Basically it's just giving me Chop/Slash/Controlled/Block attack styles at the minute.. I'm trying to get it to display 'Flick/Lash/Deflect' (Or whatever the standard whip attack styles are)...
Any ideas on how I'd do this?
Also my Punch/Kick/Block are a little messed up, Punch trains defence, Kick trains attack and Block trains Strength..
I've managed to sort the animations out properly, but couldn't find out where or how to change which experience you gained from them?
All help is appreciated and +REP will be given to good answers.. Thanks! :)

item.title: Changing attack styles for custom weapons & Changing punch/kick/block (unarmed)
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Oh haha, my bad, thought it was 10 to be able to rep++

And thank you very much I shall have a butchers now

Read full topic

item.title: Changing attack styles for custom weapons & Changing punch/kick/block (unarmed)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:1, topic:426541”]I’m currently using a 317 base and have been trying to figure out how to change the attack styles for the custom whips I’ve added for the past hour

Im not sure if it’s client sided, server sided, or both…
Basically it’s just giving me Chop/Slash/Controlled/Block attack styles at the minute…
I’m trying to get it to display ‘Flick/Lash/Deflect’ (Or whatever the standard whip attack styles are)…

Any ideas on how I’d do this?

Also my Punch/Kick/Block are a little messed up, Punch trains defence, Kick trains attack and Block trains Strength…

I’ve managed to sort the animations out properly, but couldn’t find out where or how to change which experience you gained from them?

All help is appreciated and +REP will be given to good answers…
Thanks! :)[/quote]

  1. You can’t rep++
  2. The mixed Experience problem can probably be found and fixed under ActionButton packets.

Read full topic
